label: Evidence
comment: Evidence to support a conformity or identity claim.

datatypeProperties.comment: The assurance level of the evidence (self declaration, 2nd party, 3rd party, accredited auditor)
The URL of the evidence credential. Should be a hashlink to avoid post-issue tampering.
Format of the evidence (verifiable credential, document, website, etc)

referencedBy.comment: A URI pointing to the evidence supporting the claim. Most likely in the form of a verifiable credential.
Link to evidence that attests to the validity and ownership of the identifer.
